dct_title_s: A new map of Arabia, including Egypt, Abyssinia, the Red Sea &c. &c
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
4 bar scales on map given in "Great Arabian miles", "Persian parasanges", "British statute miles", and "Common French leagues".
Shows topography, drainage, vegetation, islands off the coast, boundaries, caravan travel routes, settlements, tribal territories, places of historical interest.
